title: Functional Workflows - Conversational AI for Insurance Operations
description: Explore AI-driven automation in customer engagement across the insurance claim lifecycle — from First Notification of Loss (FNOL) to post-submission support.

modules.moduleTitle: Module - First Notification of Loss (FNOL) Automation
modules.functionalOverview: Enables seamless, AI-guided intake of claims via structured, dynamic conversations — eliminating manual errors and improving experience.

features.title: Identity Verification
features.detail: OTP, policy number, or biometric authentication

features.title: Context-Aware Questions
features.detail: Auto-customized based on type (e.g., Auto, Health, Property)

features.title: Document Collection
features.detail: Upload damage photos, FIRs, medical reports etc.

features.title: Geo & Time Validation
features.detail: Real-time validation of location and incident time

features.title: Claim Summary Confirmation
features.detail: Summary generated and reviewed before submission

benefits: ✅ Reduction in incomplete or incorrect submissions
🧠 Higher CSAT with intuitive AI assistance

modules.functionalOverview: Uses real-time API integrations to respond to claim status inquiries conversationally, securely, and instantly.

features.title: Status Retrieval
features.detail: Via secure, authenticated backend API calls

features.title: Status Classification
features.detail: Submitted, In Review, Approved, Rejected, etc.

features.title: Proactive Communication
features.detail: Shows timelines, next steps, and resolution expectations

features.title: Security Layer
features.detail: Multi-factor authentication to safeguard sensitive claim data
